Other Information.Test Conditions: 1 bar of O2 at 70 °C for 12 h
Other Information.Additional Info: Only inner zeolitic conversion occurs within SGU-29 nanochannels.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 1 bar of O2 at 70 °C for 12 h
Other Information.Additional Info: Bulky scavenger unable to enter SGU-29 channels; inhibits external surface and solvent reactions.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 1 bar of O2 at 70 °C for 12 h
Other Information.Additional Info: Unable to enter SGU-29 channels due to size similarity with window dimensions.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Cyclohexene conversion yield: 42%, Selectivity: 2-cyclohexene-1-ol (23%), 2-cyclohexene-1-one (48%), cyclohexene hydroperoxide (23%)

Other Information.Additional Info: Catalytic activity is attributed to [CuO4] square planar units in confined nanochannels; no physical or chemical destruction of SGU-29 observed.
